## Description {#details}

Information describing a function or inlined call site introduced by .cv&#95;func&#95;id or .cv&#95;inline&#95;site&#95;id.

Accumulates information from .cv&#95;loc directives used with this function&#39;s id or the id of an inlined call site within this function or inlined call site.

Definition at line 98 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mccodeview-h">MCCodeView.h</a>.

### InlinedAt {#a364d97d77cb1c191b75ad223b360ff28}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="LineInfo llvm::MCCVFunctionInfo::InlinedAt">

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mccodeview-h/#l00114">114</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mccodeview-h">MCCodeView.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### InlinedAtMap {#ae30c8d77d4c26d16cc60ebd3de0f3b26}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>DenseMap&lt;unsigned, LineInfo&gt; llvm::MCCVFunctionInfo::InlinedAtMap</>}>
Map from inlined call site id to the inlined at location to use for that call site.

Call chains are collapsed, so for the call chain &#39;f -&gt; g -&gt; h&#39;, the InlinedAtMap of &#39;f&#39; will contain entries for &#39;g&#39; and &#39;h&#39; that both list the line info for the &#39;g&#39; call site.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mccodeview-h/#l00124">124</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mccodeview-h">MCCodeView.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### ParentFuncIdPlusOne {#a6501b119f7ba7b15237d1f43dd16ccbc}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="unsigned llvm::MCCVFunctionInfo::ParentFuncIdPlusOne = 0">
If this represents an inlined call site, then ParentFuncIdPlusOne will be the parent function id plus one.

If this represents a normal function, then there is no parent, and ParentFuncIdPlusOne will be FunctionSentinel. If this struct is an unallocated slot in the function info vector, then ParentFuncIdPlusOne will be zero.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mccodeview-h/#l00104">104</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mccodeview-h">MCCodeView.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### Section {#a5a57622bc8d3165baf9cae9606a20c33}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>MCSection&#42; llvm::MCCVFunctionInfo::Section = nullptr</>}>
The section of the first .cv&#95;loc directive used for this function, or null if none has been seen yet.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mccodeview-h/#l00118">118</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mccodeview-h">MCCodeView.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
